channel.title: Geopolitics on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics
channel.description: Recent content in Geopolitics on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics

item.title: Geopolitics & Regional Security
item.description: Mapping power shifts, conflict/cooperation patterns, and Pakistan’s security calculus across its neighborhood and great-power competition.

item.title: Pakistan’s Options in Emerging Geopolitics
item.description: A decision memo on how Pakistan can balance great-power competition while securing regional stability.

item.title: Emerging Geopolitics: Meaning, Why It Matters, and Key Implications
item.description: A concise guide to the forces reshaping state behavior, markets, and societies—from technology rivalry and climate to demographics and security.
